# Draft:ZOZWEB SOFTWARES PRIVATE LIMITED

----
ZOZWEB Softwares Private Limited
ZOZWEB Softwares Private Limited is an Indian information technology and software development company headquartered in Panagudi Tamilnadu, India. Incorporated in 2025, the company provides web development, mobile application development, digital marketing, and customized software solutions for businesses across various sectors. It operates under the Companies Act, 2013 of India and is registered with the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA).
History
The company began as a web design and development service provider, later expanding its offerings to include software products, cloud hosting solutions, and mobile application development.
Services
The company offers a range of services, including:
Web design and development — Creation of corporate and e-commerce websites using frameworks such as Yii2, Laravel, and other PHP-based systems.
Custom software development — Enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems, learning management systems (LMS), and industry-specific applications.
Mobile application development — Android and iOS applications for business and consumer use.
Digital marketing — Search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, and online advertising campaigns.
Cloud hosting — Web hosting, server management, and e-commerce security solutions.
Products
Notable products developed by the company include:
TNPSC LMS — An online learning platform for Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission exam preparation.
Warehouse Management System — A logistics and inventory management platform.
Restaurant Management System — A software solution for restaurant ordering and billing.
Operations
ZOZWEB serves clients in India and internationally, offering both on-premises and cloud-based software deployment. The company markets its services through its website, social media platforms, and direct business partnerships.
